title: Handwritten script type ID
content:
[Awareness & Compassion](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083039/http:/www.waterfordestateslodge.com/images/news/Hannah_Logo.jpg)

Any insight?

And while you're at it, where's that ampersand from? Thanks a bunch.
author: clashmore

comments.content: Thanks, looks like they put a stroke on it.

You’re welcome.  
And [Casablanca](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083039/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/red_rooster/casablanca_medium_condensed/?sample_text=HANNAH%20FRIENDS&sample_size=74) for ‘HANNAH FRIENDS’ and [Palatino](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083039/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/palatino_complete_vp/?sample_text=%26&sample_size=74) for the ampersand between ‘HANNAH’ and ‘FRIENDS’.
Yep, What the Font gave my Casablanca. Couldn't figure out the other two though. Appreciate it.
